channel.title: security on Bit By Bit
channel.description: Recent content in security on Bit By Bit

item.title: We are your package maintainers, and we are here to help
item.description: So, I was on my computer, doing normal computer stuff. Suddenly the trusty Ubuntu Software Updater rear its head. Being curious, I start poking around, and not long after, I was confronted with this: Sorry, security people, I should have tagged this post Not Safe Or Secure. If you follow the link above Wait! Don't do it! maybe you are running the updated packages right now!!! … scared you, didn’t I?
